name: Timesink
description:
This is an experimental project made during my studies at Uppsala University, Campus Gotland. The game is a physics playground, where your only goal is to launch cubes into containers using the different powers from your weapon.

The mood and aesthetics are inspired by the song TIMESINK by Lorn, which is what you hear in-game.

Controls

MovementW, A, S, DJumpSpaceShoot projectileLeft mouse buttonActivate projectileRight mouse buttonDestroy projectileMiddle mouse buttonActivate (environment)EInspect weaponF (use mouse cursor to interact with controls)Quick effect change1, 2, 3, 4

Team members

Kentaro Hayashida - Programming, 3D graphics, VFX
Benjamin Harbakk - Graphics, VFX
Carl Hvarfvenius Blomgren - Level design, concept art
